column2: "Na nsɛm a yɛreka yi no mu tsitsir nye yi: dɛm sɔfopanyin yi na yɛwɔ
column3: nyia ɔakɛtsena Enyimnyam Hen n'ahengua no enyimfa wɔ sorsor no

column2: "krɔnkrɔnbea no nye nokwar ntamadan a Nyankopɔn nankasa
column3: na nnyɛ nyimpa bi sii no no somfo."

column2: "Na sɔfopanyin biara wɔhyɛ no ama ɔdze ayɛyɛdze nye afɔrbɔdze aama: dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ oyi so onya biribi a ɔdze bɛma."
"Na sɛ ɔwɔ asaase do ha a
column4: osiandɛ hɔn a wɔdze ayɛyɛdze ma dɛ mbrɛ mbra no tse no

column2: "hɔn na wɔsom sor ndzɛmba no nsusudo nye no mfonyi; dɛ mbrɛ wɔbɔɔ Moses nkaa wɔ ber a oribesi ntamadan no: na ɔse dɛ
column3: Hwɛ dɛ eyɛ adze nyina dɛ mbrɛ nsusudo a wɔdze kyerɛɛ wo wɔ koko no do no tse."

column2: "Na afei ne nsa aka asɔfodzi a ɔkyɛn
column3: dɛ ɔayɛ ntamugyinafo wɔ ahyɛmu a oye kyɛn a wogyina anohoba a oye kyɛn no do hyɛɛ no ho."

column2: "Na sɛ dza odzi kan no ho nnyi asɛm a
column3: nkyɛ wɔannhwehwɛ gyinabew bi amma dza otsia ebien no."

column2: "Na onyaa hɔn ho asɛm bi no
column7: Dɛ menye Israel fie nye Juda fie bedzi ahyɛmu fofor;"

column2: "Ɔnntse dɛ ahyɛmu a menye hɔn egyanom dzii Wɔ da a mususuoo hɔn nsamu yii hɔn fii Egypt asaase do no; Na hɔn dze wɔanntsena m'ahyɛmu no mu
column3: Ntsi mo so manndwen hɔn ho

column2: "Na ahyɛmu a menye Israel fi bedzi nye yi
column4: Ewuradze se; Medze me mbra bɛhyɛ hɔn adwen mu
column5: Na makyerɛw no hɔn akoma do so; Na mayɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn Na hɔn so wɔayɛ me man;"

column4: Hu Ewuradze: Na hɔn nyina bohu me
column5: Ofitsi hɔn mu kakraba do kesi kɛse do."

column2: "Ɔreka Ahyɛmu Fofor ho asɛm no ɔse
column3: ɔayɛ dza odzi kan no dadaw. Na dza ɔayɛ dadaw na ne ber rutwa mu no ɔnnkɛkyɛr na ɔaayew."
